snippet: During the Orioles' 14 straight seasons of missing the playoffs, their opponents in the A.L. division series, the Yankees, made it 13 times and won 18 postseason series.
abstract: During the Orioles' 14 straight seasons of missing the playoffs, their opponents in the A.L. division series, the Yankees, made it 13 times and won 18 postseason series.

headline.main: A.L.D.S. Preview: Drought Over, Orioles Face a Seasoned Foe
